shortDescription: Captain Arano, we're counting about fifteen 'Mechs heading towards the cache entrance that is nearest your DropShip. Most of them are lights and mediums, which your lance should be capable of handling, but get out of there before the biggest ones arrive.
longDescription: Captain Arano and her lance must get to the Adamastor, including Yang who is riding on her BattleMech, {COMMANDER.FirstName}.

objectiveList.title: Reach the LZ for extraction, again.

dialogueContent.words: Captain Arano! We've just detected enemy infiltrators...
Heads up everyone!
They're here already! And they're boarding the DropShip!
We have you, Captain Arano. Clearing the area now!
That could have gone better, the Adamastor and its crew didn't deserve this!
That unknown JumpShip deployed too quickly. We'll go through this on debriefing once we're safe.
Captain Arano, are you still operational? Please respond, Captain Arano.
Looks like we've got a clear path to the DropShip. Won't last long, though.
Understood. We're moving out.
Just a warning - these 'Mechs are at least as advanced as ours.
Likely they're from the same cache as ours, Yang!
No, different readings, those 'Mechs are different!
Captain? I'm getting strange readings...
Something inside that cache just went critical and exploded!
Tell us that wasn't your fault, Yang?
No. And I doubt the pirates would do it willingly. Maybe a safety feature we missed?
Doesn't matter, the Bar-Dyness cache is gone, except for this Kintaro.
Yeah... too bad about all those Canopian pleasure models...
Yang, focus, we still need to get you guys out of there.
These are not 'Mechs from this cache, I've never seen those variants with that kind of lostech.
[static] [unintelligible sound] [static]
Captain, we're detecting more naval strikes being launched, be prepared!
Captain Pança, are you still alive?
Yeah, I think I just sharted in my pants though, I'm the only survivor at the bridge after commandos attacked the DropShip.
Anyone else still alive inside the DropShip?
Wait, a warning protocol just activated on one of the displays...
Captain Arano, are you hearing that sound? Is that your 'Mechs?
Ah, shit! INCOMING!
That was a DropShip! Who deliberately destroys a space ship?
Someone who doesn't want us to escape.
A pirate captain would rather capture the Adamastor than destroy it.
They have a gunship in orbit, we didn't detect it until it fired and it seems likely that it will continue to do so.
Captain Arano, I suggest all of you to leave your current position and head into the valley. It will be easier for you to avoid their naval gunfire and to exfiltrate you in the open terrain.
Roger that, XO. Moving out.
Captain Arano! We've got incoming assault 'Mechs!
Everyone, a last push and we're out of here!
All enemies clear, moving for rendez-vous, Captain Arano.
Well, regardless of all the excitement, I think I prefer to stick to pleasure models after this adventure.
Glad to hear, Hysteria. We've got our prize, let's get out of here!
